name: Galaxy Rush: Space Jump Attack
description:
Fire up your space thrusters, to jump on another planet and bring it back to life, but avoid asteroids
Unlock all spaceships


FEATURES:
- Simple controls with one tap to jump , so dive right in and fire the planets up
- Various spaceships
- Cool cartoon graphics
- Great music and sounds
- More then 70 levels full of asteroids to let avoid
- Teleport, slow motion, shields, blasters power-ups to use

Enjoy challenging one finger gameplay. Download now for free!
